analysis.description: daocrowdsale.masterFns (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#303-307) allows anyone to destruct the contract

daocrowdsale.masterBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#283-286) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- daocrowdsale.timeOfPreviousShift
	- daocrowdsale.currentState
	- daocrowdsale.Values
	- daocrowdsale.timeOfNextShift

Reentrancy in daocrowdsale.daocrowdsale (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#199-212):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(DAO.passwordMint(owner,5002,password)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#202-203)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Values (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#203-204)

daocrowdsale.TimeCheck (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#244-249) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeOfNextShift > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/15/0x4c478ac32725872e30bca49957abc7dbb325cb21.sol#246)
